column1: lemonmilk - I have a message to relay! -->  message from 200726 self to you: ily <3 don't be dumb <33
ToiletPaperGod - you can learn from the **BIG BRAIN** messages from lemonmilk today! Well any day really -  but today especially!
Ooh lemonmilk has a good taste for design. Perhaps you can design me a better profile picture than the one Ajay gave to me?
